definition: lacking special distinction, rank, or status, an intermediate scale value regarded as normal or usual, to compute the average of
details:
adjective
- lacking special distinction, rank, or status
= synonyms: ordinary
- around the middle of a scale of evaluation
= example: around the middle of a scale of evaluation
= synonyms: medium
- approximating the statistical norm or average or expected value
= example: approximating the statistical norm or average or expected value
= synonyms: mean
- relating to or constituting the middle value of an ordered set of values (or the average of the middle two in a set with an even number of values)
= synonyms: median
- relating to or constituting the most frequent value in a distribution
= synonyms: modal
- lacking exceptional quality or ability
= example: lacking exceptional quality or ability
= synonyms: middling
noun
- an intermediate scale value regarded as normal or usual
= example: an intermediate scale value regarded as normal or usual
- a statistic describing the location of a distribution
= synonyms: norm
- (sports) the ratio of successful performances to opportunities
verb
- to compute the average of
= example: to compute the average of
= synonyms: average out
- to achieve or reach on average
= example: to achieve or reach on average
- to amount to or come to an average, without loss or gain
= example: to amount to or come to an average, without loss or gain
= synonyms: average out
